subSubSection.paragraph:
TYPE
DEPOSITORY: of
G . bicolor : Istituto Sperimentale
per la Zoologia Agraria, Firenze, Italy ; of
G . americanus
: Connecticut Agricultural Experiment Station, Connecticut, USA ; of
D . circuliformis
: not stated; of
D . shealsi : Hebrew
University, Jerusalem, Israel ; of
G . major
: Laboratoired’Acarologie, l’Ecole Pratique des Hautes Études, Paris, France .

TYPE
LOCALITY AND HABITAT : of
G . bicolor : Firenze
, Italy , in humus of a vegetable garden; of
G . americanus : Mount Carmel
, Connecticut, USA , on bark of apple trees (Plantae: Rosaceae ); of
D . circuliformis : Admont
, Austria , in manure; of
D . shealsi
: Israel , in nest of the mole-rat
Spalax ehrenbergi
(Animalia: Spalacidae ); of
G . major : Cuesta
del Ralo Salcedo, Pontevedra, Spain , in moss on bark.

NOTE :
Gwiazdowicz & Halliday ( 2008 : 66 )
questioned the correct generic placement of
G . ( D .) bicolor
.
